page.title: 13THE LIFE OF A VICAR. cont.
page.content: The vicar, Mr. Jones, has a very varied job, often the unexpected can happen - perhaps an accident or a death. Generally, on Mondays he writes and answers letters and tries to prepare a plan for the week. He keeps Monday afternoon free for visiting hospital. During the rest of the week he does many things. Basically, as a vicar, he admimisters the Parish, keeping his four churches open, visiting the sick and bereaved, taking services, weddings, burials, baptisms and confirmations. He tries to keep Fridays as a day off and likes to spend it doing nothing. Often he goes shopping to Swansea, visits his mother or just potters about in the garden.
